data.text: It is for the Governments to cover the costs while encouraging the people, who can afford, to pay for it. Private enterprises should also chip in , as many are already doing, to cover the cost for employees and families. It is ultimately in their interest 3/n

@SerumInstIndia and Poonawala are not in business of charity. What if the vaccine failed the trial last year? All the people who are calling him names, would they have come chipped in to cover his losses 2/n
